author: @Live5News
title: Parents concerned after first day brings school bus woes in Berkeley Co.
text: HANAHAN, S.C. (WCSC) - Berkeley County students returned to the classroom Thursday, but some parents said not all of them got there on time. Pick-up for Hanahan Middle School was set for 7:30 a.m. in the Tanner Plantation community, according to parents, but it wasn’t until 9 a.m. that a bus showed up. The bus that arrived, though, wasn’t even the right bus, as parents who did not want to be identified said it was the bus meant to pick up high school students. Parents asked the driver if he could take the middle schoolers as well and after he radioed for permission, they were on their way. Neighbors said they understand hiccups happen but what happened on Thursday is a huge safety concern. Calls for communication to be improved are now aimed at the school district. The Berkeley County School District provided the following statement: Berkeley County bus drivers transport 28,000 students to school and back home safely each day. Our first drivers report to work as early as 4:30 a.m. and our last drivers conclude their days between 6:30p-7:00 p.m. In the first few days of school, students are learning bus expectations, drivers are learning about their students, and routes are being adjusted daily for traffic. Our transportation department has received minimal reports of a student not connecting with their bus, the reasons for this can vary from: - Brand new drivers learning bus routes and navigating areas with increased traffic - Due to the severe weather and flooding largely impacting Berkeley County, drivers were unable to train on newly assigned routes - Incomplete (or inaccurate) new student and returning student information - General delays resulting from increased first day of school traffic We appreciate our parents and community who support our bus drivers and have encouraged them as they navigate transportation within one of the fastest-growing counties in the state and nation. Delays will be experienced in the first few days or weeks of school; however, our commitment is to ensure that all of our bus riders are transported to school and home safely. Parents are hoping for a smoother morning on Friday. Copyright 2024 WCSC. All rights reserved.

author: AOL Staff
title: Kim Jong UN bans Christmas, but activists send gifts of Bibles, food and messages of hope
text: Kim Jong UN bans Christmas, but activists send gifts of Bibles, food and messages of hope [Christmas is banned in North Korea](https://www.foxnews.com/category/special/occasions/christmas), but that is not stopping a group of activists from sending messages of hope, faith and freedom to the people suffering under the dictatorship of Kim Jong Un. Flash drives celebrating the holiday, and including Bible readings, were launched into the Yellow Sea in bottles so that the currents will carry them to the shores of the North Korean peninsula. "We should be doing everything we can to get information into [North Korea](https://www.foxnews.com/category/world/conflicts/north-korea) by land, by sea and by air," says Suzanne Scholte, chair of the Washington, D.C.-based North Korean Freedom Coalition which sponsored the messages. The operation is part of the group's "Operation Truth," which Scholte says, "is modeled after the Berlin Airlift, to get critical help to the starving people of North Korea." [The group](https://www.foxnews.com/category/organization) has conducted 17 launches of the bottles. Each bottle also contains enough rice to feed a family of four for a week, as well as a Bible on a flash drive and a U.S. $1 bill. Among those launching the messages were nine North Korean escapees who want to bring freedom to their homeland. [NORTH KOREA REPORTEDLY PERSECUTES CHRISTIANS MORE THAN ANY OTHER COUNTRY AROUND THE WORLD: STUDY](https://www.foxnews.com/world/north-korea-reportedly-persecutes-christians-more-than-any-other-country-around-world-study) Scholte's Christmas message that is included in the bottles says in part, "Christmas, which is celebrated all over the world on December 25th, marks the day when Jesus was born...Many of your ancestors also believed in Jesus. IN fact, in 1907, in Pyongyang, there were so many [Christians who believed in Jesus](https://www.foxnews.com/category/world/religion/christianity) that Pyongyang became known as a Holy City. But when Kim II Sung came to power, he wanted North Koreans to worship him as a god, and not the one true God. So, he killed many Christian leaders, sent others to political prison camps, or banished them. He did all he could to kill the followers of Jesus Christ..." The flash drives also contain North Korean music, changing the lyrics from worshiping Kim Jong Un to worshiping God. They also play K-Pop songs, the Books of Matthew and Mark, as well as recorded messages from several members of Congress touting freedom for the North Korean people. Among those who recorded messages were Senators Jim Risch and Tim Kaine, as well as Congressmen Michael McCaul and Gregory Meeks. [MAN WHO FLED NORTH KOREA FOR AMERICA RETURNS TO FEED STARVING CITIZENS: 'GOD CALLED ME'](https://www.foxnews.com/media/man-fled-north-korea-america-returns-feed-starving-citizens-finding-success-america-god-called-me) The North Korean Freedom Coalition started the outreach in 2022. It also has sent 600 shortwave radios with ear buds into the kingdom. During the summer, they started a program for Americans to order items that could be delivered to North Korea. Scholte said that an increasing number of North Koreans are learning about the outside world because of the efforts of her group. "We must communicate to the people in power in Pyongyang that they have friends and allies in Korea and America, who have only one desire for them: to share with the benefits of a free people, to give them a life of home instead of despair," she said. "Those in leadership positions in the DPRK regime wake up in the morning with only two choices in their lives: being slaves devoted to [Kim Jong Un](https://www.foxnews.com/category/person/kim-jong-un) or death and their families' deaths. That is why so many began escaping -not just for food, but for freedom, for a better life." [KIM JONG UN WEEPS AS HE CALLS ON NORTH KOREAN WOMEN TO HAVE MORE CHILDREN TO STEM BIRTH RATE DECLINE](https://www.foxnews.com/world/kim-jong-un-weeps-calls-north-korean-women-more-children-stem-birth-rate-decline) Scholte's group and [the Defense Forum Foundation](http://www.defenseforumfoundation.org) also help operate Free North Korea Radio, a station that broadcasts news and information into North Korea. Its director, Kim Song Min, escaped in 1997, and despite attempts by the dictatorship to jam its programming, the station has broadcast on shortwave and on the internet. "I would like to express my gratitude to the Americans for standing with us to help us reach the people of North Korea with the truth about America and South Korea," he said. "North Koreans are brainwashed from childhood to hate Americans as their enemy and believe that America occupies South Korea, making them live in misery while North Korea prospers as a paradise under the Kim dictatorship." ['CHRISTMAS SERMON' BY AUTHOR C.S. LEWIS WARNED OF A WORLD THAT NO LONGER KNEW RIGHT FROM WRONG](https://www.foxnews.com/lifestyle/christmas-sermon-author-c-s-lewis-warned-world-no-longer-knew-right-wrong) There is another message that the activists are delivering to the North Korean people, one bottle at a time. Scholte said that message is what Americans cherish. "The benefits of a free people, [a life of hope](https://www.foxnews.com/category/faith-values/faith) instead of despair." Fox News' Emily Robertson contributed to this report. Original article source: [Kim Jong UN bans Christmas, but activists send gifts of Bibles, food and messages of hope](https://www.foxnews.com/world/kim-jong-un-bans-christmas-activists-send-gifts-bibles-food-messages-hope)

author: Bar & Bench
title: Allahabad High Court orders probe against student who accused teacher of attempting conversion, establishing sexual relation
text:
The Allahabad High Court recently ordered a police probe against a school student who last year had accused his teacher of trying to convert him to Christianity and pressuring him to have a sexual relationship with him [ Principal St Aloysius High School Cantt Kanpur vs State of UP & 2 Others ].
Loading content, please wait... Allahabad High Court conversion Forced religious conversion

author: 作者
title: 河南翔宇医疗与南昌大学附属康复医院洽谈战略合作 共绘康复医疗发展新蓝图-江西网健康频道
text:
大江网/大江新闻客户端讯 (李 珊、陈凯云) 7月29日，南昌大学附属康复医院与河南翔宇医疗设备股份有限公司举行战略合作洽谈会，双方围绕共建医企协同创新平台展开深度交流，并达成重要合作共识。南昌大学附属康复医院院长冯珍、党委副书记陈南萍及相关职能科室负责人参加会议。
会上，冯珍对河南翔宇集团董事长何永正一行的来访表示热烈欢迎。医院作为南昌大学服务江西省“1269行动计划”医药产业链康复医疗器械方向牵头单位，始终致力于打通“临床需求-技术研发-产业转化”的全链条闭环。此次与翔宇医疗的战略合作，将充分发挥南昌大学附属康复医院的临床科研优势和翔宇医疗的产业化经验，重点围绕脑机接口康复技术、智能康复机器人、中医诊疗设备等国产化创新项目开展联合攻关，为患者提供更优质、更先进的康复医疗服务。”
陈南萍指出，此次合作通过医工深度融合，推动康复医疗技术的创新与应用，助力江西乃至全国患者早日用上国际一流水平的康复器械，提升全民健康水平。
何永正介绍了公司的发展历程、核心竞争优势与未来规划。他强调，翔宇医疗始终以技术创新为驱动，专注于智能康复设备的研发、生产与全场景应用。希望通过共建院企联合研发平台，在创新人才交流、医企经验共享、脑机接口医疗及临床研究等领域开展深度合作，共同探索康复医疗发展的新路径。
此次交流合作，标志着南昌大学附属康复医院在深化“医企联动”模式探索上迈出了具有战略意义的关键步伐，将为医院实现高质量发展、引领康复医疗创新模式提供强劲动力。

author: Mattia Gussoni
title: Meteo: Weekend con staffetta tra Perturbazioni, nuovo intenso Peggioramento da Domenica, i dettagli
text:
Il primo fronte perturbato ad influenzare il mare nostrum provocherà un peggioramento del tempo in realtà già dalla giornata di Venerdì 3 Gennaio provocando delle precipitazioni in Emilia Romagna e sulle regioni del Centro: gli effetti di questo impulso si faranno poi sentire anche nel corso di Sabato 4 Gennaio, quando alcune piogge persisteranno al Sud, a fronte di un miglioramento che avrà luogo sul resto d'Italia che potrà via via godere di maggiori spazi soleggiati, salvo qualche banco di nebbia sulle basse pianure settentrionali.
La tregua durerò poco.
Domenica 5 Gennaio, specie nella seconda parte della giornata, giungerà infatti un secondo fronte perturbato, più intenso, destinato a provocare inzialmente deboli piogge su Liguria e Toscana, ma poi in rapida estensione nel corso della successiva notte anche al resto del Nord, dove sulle Alpi è attesa la neve oltre i 1000 metri di quota (con quota in calo nella successiva notte).
PER APPROFONDIRE: [Meteo: Befana carica di Pioggia e Neve, gli aggiornamenti](https://www.ilmeteo.it/notizie/meteo-befana-con-vortice-di-maltempo-pioggia-vento-e-nevicate-gli-aggiornamenti-164001)
